module.name: User Management
module.description: This Module manages all FreePBX users excluding Administrators (at this time). It allows an Administrator to create a User Account that can be used by other applications for login or API purposes. Modules like iSymphony, Rest API and User Control Panel use this module to manage their users.
module.changelog: *12.0.10* Invisible display names... *12.0.9* Provide a method to get contact details (hookable) *12.0.8* NULL values if they are empty *12.0.7* Add new Display Name Field *12.0.6* Escape out class *12.0.5* User proper 12 hooking *12.0.4* FREEPBX-7797 require confirmation before user delete *12.0.3* FREEPBX-8049 Auto Generation of User Management from ARI (amportal a userman migrate) *12.0.2* Tweaks and cleanup *12.0.1* Redo module_hook calls to use static obj *2.11.11* Send emails out on new user creation or on editing *2.11.10* FREEPBX-7494 Userman automaticly links like extensions with leading 0 *2.11.9* Finishing touches to creating new user from extensions page *2.11.8* Sorting order and display fixes *2.11.7* Check for Class instead of version *2.11.6* Update to Extra attributes, if they dont exist dont erase them *2.11.5* FREEPBX-7686 can not edit user *2.11.4* Prevent duplicate usernames when changing username *2.11.3* FREEPBX-7405 Unlink Extension from User when Extension is deleted *2.11.2* Cleanup and languaging and some javascript helpers *2.11.0beta10* Update license *2.11.0beta9* Fixe bug when assigning a user to an extension *2.11.0beta8* Fixes FREEPBX-7253 dont try to use the array if its false *2.11.0beta7* Fixes FREEPBX-7245 forgetting user data on inital add *2.11.0beta6* Skinning Changes *2.11.0beta5* Spelling Mistakes *2.11.0beta4* Cleanup and Extensive Documentation *2.11.0beta3* Move Processes into hook function for 2.11 *2.11.0beta2* Fixed the order of updating users *2.11.0beta1* Change to beta *2.11.0alpha2* Add more fields *2.11.0alpha1* Initial Module
